Detailed Description

CSwordModuleSearch manages the search on Sword modules.

It manages the thread(s) and manages the different modules.

Author(s):
The BibleTime team
Version:
Id: cswordmodulesearch.h,v 1.4 2001/04/11 22:47:19 joachim Exp

Member Function Documentation

const bool CSwordModuleSearch::foundItems ( )

Returns:
"true" if in the last search the searcher found items, if no items were found return "false"

void CSwordModuleSearch::setSearchOptions ( int options )

Sets the options for this search.

Options include the flags and search types of the Sword searc interface.
